title: Warwick Rework Teaser?

embed.description: Really hyped about the warwick change or is it a new champion? Still hyped tho. Follow me on Twitter. https://twitter.com/?lang=en

body: Could be warwick or new Champion idk what do you think?

replies.body:
>  Given the timing, claws, themes of beasts and transformations, current assumption this is a teaser related to the upcoming WARWICK champion update. We've been told explicitly that Warwick would be before the next new champion after Camille. While lore for folks like Taric, Poppy, and Yorick changed significantly with their updates, this story also shares several themes with Warwick's current story - experiments, Singed, etc.

from ff @ 20, definitely ww
It's warwick. it's always a champion - rework - champion - rework.
